thread.title: Europa League: Liverpool boss Jergen Klopp not happy with draw on Anfield debut
thread.title_full: Europa League: Liverpool boss Jergen Klopp not happy with draw on Anfield debut - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Europa League: Liverpool boss Jergen Klopp not happy with draw on Anfield debut
text:
*Liverpool: *Liverpool were held to a 1-1 draw by 10-man Rubin Kazan in a Europa League clash in new manager Juergen Klopp's first game in charge at Anfield , and he is not quite satisfied with the peformance of his wards.
Playing in front of their home fans, Liverpool conceeded an early goal in the Group B game when Marko ... Â»
